== Kizhakkummuri (627914) ==

Kizhakkummuri is a village in the [[Mukundapuram]] taluka of [[Thrissur]] district with an area of 1329 hectares and harbouring 3831 households with total population of 14905 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Chalakudy]] is at a distance of 6 km. Male population is 7260 and female population is 7645. Scheduled Caste Population is 1424 and Scheduled Tribes population is 13. Census Location Code of the village is 627914<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.
